=== Incomplete awlsim TODO list ===

- Data block length/number operations (DBLG, DBNO, DILG, DINO)
- Parsing of attributes
- Areacode 87 for P## in FCs
- ANY pointer
- Multiinstance
- ARRAYs
- Parsing of various immediates (see optrans.py and datatypes.py)
- Symbols
- English mnemonics for status-word bits
- User defined data types (UDT)
- Advanced editor features
